author: jshlee
body:
#### PR description:

- fix for issue #32958 
- updated the emapping for GE0
- current mapping has larger addresses for AMCs than no. of bits stored for this causing data loss during packing.

#### PR validation:

- tested with samples listed in https://dmytro.web.cern.ch/dmytro/cmsprodmon/workflows.php?campaign=CMSSW_11_3_0_pre3__UPSG_Std_2026D76PU200_highPU-1613648957
- tested with workflows 34611.0 11611.0 34650.0
title: GEM - fixed mapping for GE0
